General.Name: Midway Limited
General.Description: Midway Limited engages in the production, processing, and export of woodfibre in Australia, China, Japan, and Southeast Asia. It operates through Woodfibre, Forestry Logistics, and Plantation Management segments. The company provides support services to third parties engaged in growing woodfibre, including harvest and haul; supplies biomass woodchips and sawdust; and planation management services, comprising silviculture services. In addition, the company markets third party woodfibre. Midway Limited was incorporated in 1980 and is based in North Shore, Australia.
General.Address: 10 The Esplanade, North Shore, VIC, Australia, 3214
